reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My favorite sweater
reviews.reviewText: I love these sweaters and bought another. Usually when I buy clothes online at a good price, they’re not good quality when they arrive or look different than the photo. But these are very nice sweaters and fit well. Slightly oversized so I think if I get another, I may get a size bigger but even buying your regular size, they’re are a little oversized. Very thick and warm. So cute! Soft not scratchy at all.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and very good quality!
reviews.reviewText: Although this sweater is not fitted like I usually prefer, it is very comfortable and super soft. It looks really good with tighter fitted pants. I am usually a small, but ordered a medium and it fits quite nicely. Definitely worth the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Thick and pretty
reviews.reviewText: Sweater is thick and cozy. I got the large for an oversize off the shoulder look and it fit perfect. My only complaint is it had a very strong chemical smell. I threw it in the dryer with a dryer sheet then sprayed it with a little gain fabric spray and all better.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this sweater so much I bought a second one. Just loose enough to drop a bit off the shoulder. Material is soft and seems very well constructed. The color is neutral enough to pair with anything from jeans to dress pants or a denim skirt and riding boots.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Over priced, just OK
reviews.reviewText: For $38 I wanted the fit to be better, especially based on the measurements shown in the charts. If you have bigger boobs, then it won't be as flattering as the pics, but that's just how it goes most of the time. The bottom hem is also just unfinished and rolls up more than I'd like, so it looks chunkier than in the pics. I also wish the neck was wider so it hung more like the pics.The knit and thickness is medium weight, so it doesn't add too much bulk, which I like. It also feels fairly warm. The "yarn" is also soft.Not bad, but OK. Feel it would be better at sub $30, not closer to $40 for all it's faults.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Versatile and Elegant Sweater for Any Occasion
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the taupe sweater from Amazon, and I must say, it's absolutely stunning! The color is a beautiful neutral taupe shade that goes well with any outfit. The best part is its versatility - you can wear it on or off the shoulder, depending on your mood or the occasion.The quality of this sweater is top-notch. It's made from a soft and cozy fabric that keeps you warm without feeling too heavy. The fit is just perfect, hugging your curves in all the right places. I've received so many compliments whenever I wear it!What I love most about this sweater is its ability to transition effortlessly from a casual day out to a dressier evening event. Pair it with jeans and boots for a cozy and chic look, or dress it up with a stylish skirt and heels - the possibilities are endless!Not only is this sweater fashionable, but it's also comfortable to wear for extended periods. The fabric is breathable and doesn't irritate the skin. Plus, it's easy to care for - simply toss it in the washing machine, and it comes out just as good as new.Overall, I highly recommend the taupe sweater. It's a versatile and elegant addition to any wardrobe. Whether you want to dress it up or down, it's sure to make you look and feel fabulous. Don't hesitate to treat yourself to this gorgeous piece - you won't regret it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super happy with this!!
reviews.reviewText: Every time I see an off the shoulder sweater, I expect it to look like it does in the photo (but we all know that’s never the case). Until today!! In fact, when I tried it on I was like “wow!! It actually looks like the picture!!” I’m 5’5” and 118 lbs… always wear a small but sized up to a medium for the oversize look and it was EXACTLY what I was going for. Already ordered another one.It’s comfy with a tank under it, perfect length with leggings. Apricot color is very pretty, will easy match with any scarf. Two thumbs up!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute , goes with EVERYTHING!
reviews.reviewText: Sometimes it's hard to buy clothes online. it's really hard to gauge if it's going to look good on you… especially if the model wearing it is skinny. I'm not overweight, but I am a solid size 14-16 with athletic build.I was really surprised that it hung of my shoulder just like it did on the model in the picture! I really love showing off my shoulders.It's really soft, and washed up great. A little bit of pilling between the arm and the on the sides, but not bad.I've dressed it up. Come on, dressed casually with jeans and leggings. And it looks great. I will buy it in a few more colors I think.Heavyweight and good quality sweater.[I will update with pics soon!]

reviews.reviewTitle: Tout ce qu'on veut d'un bon pull
reviews.reviewText: Il est chaud, doux et fait très bien en "oversize".
Pour avoir le look de l'image, prendre 1 à 2 points plus grand! Si non, il est très bien!

reviews.reviewTitle: The quality and sizing has changed!!!
reviews.reviewText: I ordered 3 of these earlier this year and I loved them. I decided I would get a few more when additional colours came available. Well, the sizing and quality changed. They now fit smaller and are considerably thinner. These are not up to original standards and disappointing. Hopefully customer service is five star and they approve the return without costs
Doit être joli sur une personne de grande taille. Je mesure 5’ ne ne convient pas. Malheureusement je voulais retourner le produit mais je dois payer les frais de retour vers la Chine. C’est fâcheux
